page.title: 13SUNDAY WITH THE MARSHALLS
page.content: I have an elder sister named Katie and a younger brother called Edward. On Sunday we usually go to the woods. We put our boots on and wander up the lane. We get to the top of the hill and look at the view, then if we're lucky we sometimes see baby rabbits scampering around. In the woods nearby we often see squirrels in the Autumn and bluebell in the Spring. When we reach a certain corner, Dad usually says,"Watch out for the bear!" There are some stacked tree trunks which we all walk over. Sometimes we climb over a wall to what was once our den, made from fallen trees. After that we sit down and spot what colour car is coming past next in the valley below. Then we walk back to our house.
